cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15)

project(BuildWithDependencies VERSION 0.1)


include(${CMAKE_ROOT}/Modules/ExternalProject.cmake)

ExternalProject_Add(GTestExternal
	SOURCE_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../deps/googletest
	CMAKE_ARGS -Dgtest_force_shared_crt:BOOL=ON -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX:PATH=${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}
	INSTALL_DIR "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}"
)

ExternalProject_Add(open62541External
	SOURCE_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../deps/open62541
	CMAKE_ARGS -DUA_ENABLE_DISCOVERY:BOOL="1" -DUA_ENABLE_DISCOVERY_MULTICAST:BOOL="1" -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS:BOOL="1" -DUA_NAMESPACE_ZERO:STRING=FULL -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX:PATH=${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}
	INSTALL_DIR "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}"
)

ExternalProject_Add(open62541CppExternal
	SOURCE_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../deps/open62541Cpp
	CMAKE_ARGS -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS:BOOL="1" -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX:PATH=${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}
	INSTALL_DIR "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}"
	DEPENDS open62541External GTestExternal
)

ExternalProject_Add(SmartSoftComponentDeveloperAPIcppExternal
	SOURCE_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../deps/SmartSoftComponentDeveloperAPIcpp
	CMAKE_ARGS -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS:BOOL="1" -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX:PATH=${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}
	INSTALL_DIR "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}"
)

ExternalProject_Add(SeRoNetOpcUaBackendExternal
	SOURCE_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/..
	CMAKE_ARGS -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX:PATH=${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX} -DSERONETSDK_ENABLE_TESTS:BOOL=ON
	INSTALL_DIR "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}"
	DEPENDS SmartSoftComponentDeveloperAPIcppExternal open62541CppExternal GTestExternal
	BINARY_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/SeRoNetOpcUaBackend-build
)
